about: Hello, A Warm Welcome to my portfolio. My name is Pransu Yadav. I am a full stack developer with a B.Tech degree in Computer Science from NIT KURUKSHETRA with a strong background in both frontend and backend technologies. Over the course of my career, I have gained experience in developing web applications using JavaScript, HTML CSS, React, Node.js, Postgres and CI/CD and version control tools. During my recent internship at FantomStarter, I built web applications and solved real-world problems using Next.js, Supabase, and Hasura. I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems and look forward to applying my skills and knowledge to drive innovation in your company. My hobbies include photography and playing table tennis.
